body.name: Gaming Keyboard and Mouse Combo, K1 RGB LED Backlit Keyboard with 104 Key for PC/Laptop(White)

features: 【Full Size Keyboard, Plug and Play with It】104 Keys Full Size Keyboard. Featuring standard keyboard layout with F-keys ( function keys ) and number pad. Floating keycaps are removable and feel good in the hand. The wired keyboard brings you efficient typing while at work or gaming. Plug and play with it, no other driver or software needed.

【Practical & Ergonomic Design】The K1 keyboard is ergonomically designed with a scientific layout of high and low keycaps to fit your hands naturally, bringing maximum comfort and effectively reducing hand fatigue after prolonged use. The light up keyboard has non-slip pads on the bottom to enhance the stability of the keyboard and prevent it from moving back and forth. A great choice for your modern office use or playing games.

【RGB LED Backlight】The keyboard has fantastic RGB backlight. 8 light colors, 5 light modes, multiple brightness levels and light speeds. The double-shot injection moulding process ensures that the letters never fade and have good light transmission. Even if you use the keyboard in the dark, you can see the letters clearly (light also can be turned off).

【High-Resolution Mouse】6 levels of DPI (600/800/1200/1600/2400/3200) meet the needs of different scenarios. High speed transmission technology makes it move faster and more accurately. When playing games, you can use the high DPI for quick response and the mouse can move exactly where you want. The mouse has 7-color breathing led backlight and when it flashes to your favorite color, you can press the side button + DPI button to lock it.

【Reliable Performance & Wide Compability】Waterproof USB 2.0 cable, gold-plated interface and anti-interference magnet ring can ensure stable data transmission. This pc gaming keyboard is treated with ABS engineering plastic to prevent wear and tear. Works perfectly with Windows XP/Vista/Win7/Win8/Win10, MAC, Linux or other operating system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, responsive, and affordable!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a gamer. I play A LOT of video games (not competitively and I don't have Twitch, but you get the idea). I need fast response time in games like Fortnite and Dead by Daylight, etc. Team games, shooters, etc.At the same time, I'm not willing to spend $100+ on a keyboard/mouse setup. This keyboard and mouse package does the job.It's beautiful. The keys are responsive and have a satisfying noise. There's a click but it's not super loud, and the keys are very comfortable to push down. It lights up beautifully. There's just one color (blue) but you can set it to stationary or pulsing (press and hold FN and Esc to toggle)The mouse is very similar to a Razer mouse. It's incredibly comfortable. And best of all, there's no audible mouse click. It pleasantly surprised me.The cords are the nice cloth kind, they're not cheap. And a bonus is that they're pink because it's easy to see what cords the mouse and keyboard are when you plug them into your computer, vs. all the cords being black.Did I mention how pretty this setup is? It's even prettier in person. The keyboard itself is clear with pink buttons. The letters are clear, and the light comes through.Overall, 10/10, would happily buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and very nice to use ! Love the color options and durability of this keyboard. Great for gaming or desk top use . highly recommend . did have to buy extention usb cords . I would say the cords that are on this keyboard and mouse are 3 or 4 ft long . so we needed extention cords But work great !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes me happy!
reviews.reviewText: The colors are lighting options are great on the keyboard and mouse. I'm giving 5 stars cause the price is the best around. It's weird cause the mouse is silent but the keyboard isn't. It'd also be nice if there were those little pop out stands that are normally on keyboards. It isn't raised enough and hurts my wrists typing all day long. I have to buy a separate stand to raise it. But no other keyboard had the colors how I wanted so I'm ok with spending another 10 bucks to make it more comfy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great keyboard, okay mouse
reviews.reviewText: i have had this for 10 days now. I needed a new keyboard and mouse so i got this one. i like the keyboard, its great, i think the only issue with that is the number lock key doesn't work and even if i press it, the number pad is still usable? not sure if that is a problem anyone else is having. all of the keys work fine, they are smooth and ergonomically easy to use. the spacebar is a little more clacky compared to the other keys (i am kind of picky on the sound of my keys) and while the smaller keys sound smooth and soft the spacebar is a louder clack but i can easily overlook that when thinking about how cheap this keyboard is compared to others. the mouse is ok, it kind of messed with my scrolling settings for a bit where it went against the normal scrolling and it was a default thing that kept happening. but after a few times of using it, it stopped changing the scroll direction and it works normal now. easy to hook up and use. at first i tried to see if there was a way to change the color options but now it doesn't bother me that you can't choose your own colors. the gradient movement that the keyboard comes with and is normally set to is not distracting and I've gotten used to it now. mouse is a bit laggy but that's ok. overall i would probably buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am not a big gamer on PC but this keyboard and mouse combo are PERFECT! The keyboard is so smooth and easy to type on. The mouse it’s also very comfortable to use and smooth. I love the light feature as well. You can change the lights or even turn them off. I definitely recommend this set up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Works amazingly, mouse is a little sensitive but not too bad, keyboard does have that clicking sound, I don’t mind it I live that sound but if you’re looking for a quiet keyboard this is not for you, mouse is very quiet tho, very smooth, lights works perfectly and are very bright, I love how it works! Also very cheap, is a yes from me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and good value
reviews.reviewText: To be clear, I'm not big on what qualifies as a top of the line gaming keyboard. To my knowledge, all the top of the line gaming keyboards are going to cost over $100 dollars for a keyboard alone. They usually have a wrist-rest and interchangeable keys. I'm coming from a keyboard that had for years been falling apart and a mouse that was for a turn of the century Mac so literally buying anything would be a step up, lol.To start, the keyboard feels good. There's still some clicking and clacking to be had, but compared to my previous keyboard (An outdated logitech trash fire that was missing screws with a number of numeric keys no longer operational) The keyboard also has a good weight to it and doesn't slide all over the desk. Without the arm rest below the keyboard, it's actually great for me and the limited desk space I have.Something I didn't expect was the RGB settings. It has a lot. 6-7 colors with various modes, like breathings, rainbow-cycling - All which can have the speed of which they display changed by holding ESC+FN keys.The mouse was more simple. Standard Right/Left Click, Scroll Wheel, 2 right side thumb clicks with a DPI button below the scroll wheel to cycle thru colors or DPI Key+ Side Key on the mouse adjust single color modes that only seem to do breathing color (Fading in and out) I was able to match my keyboard and mouse to a pretty Cyan/Purple Neon to match the RGB lights in my tower and they look really cool together.Both Keyboard and Mouse use their dedicated USB cords which for the most part are decent lengths and not totally intrusive (I have minimal desk space for all my music/art crap, mind you) One cable has a somewhat fat USB connector for some reason, making a tight fit for any other USB next to it which seems a bit pointless.All and all it still gets an all star review from me. I tested gaming with Doom Eternal and the key inputs fell into place, with the mouse feeling like a good fit with the extra side keys being used for up close Melee.If you're like me and your keyboard mouse set up was a dumpster fire, this is a great upgrade. I don't usually write reviews but I'm happy with my purchase. Someday maybe I'll step up tot he world of customizable gaming keyboards but I'm in no rush with this set up. :)
Muy buen producto y funciona excelente, con buen diseño y luces . Me gustó mucho
Its comfort to use and good looking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My old keyboard and mouse were wearing down so I got this product.Just got it today, looks great, can change the brightness of the LED and the intensity of the colours. The mouse makes no noise when clicking which kinda messes me up, I keep thinking I haven't clicked .Keycaps not too loud for a mechanical keyboard, they sound nice. There is no keyboard stand on it but it does have good grip so it doesn't slide. Keyboard surprisingly a little bit heavy.
excellent produit mais attention à la lenteur de livraison .Voir 20 jours d'attente.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not a gamer but very much inlove.
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely LOVE this keyboard and mouse combo!!!I am not a gamer by any sense of the word, however I am VERY picky when it comes to mouse and keyboard combos and this has exceeded my expectations by a long shot!The keyboard: I love the fact the light comes through the keys. The colours themselves are really nice and you can dim/brighten them. The feel of the keys is a heavy, yet soft feeling, somewhat satisfying as odd as that sounds lol.The clear surround for the light to bounce off of is a lovely touch as well.The keyboard has quite a bit of weight to it which is actually awesome in terms of it not moving while you're typing away so I imagine this would be a gamers advantage also.The mouse: I wasn't sure how I felt about a light up mouse to begin with, but it's actually quite nice. My old mouse had the back/forward buttons on the side and I could not live without them so to find this magical combo where the mouse had that feature is like winning the lotto for me. The click functions on the left and right is amazing. I don't even know how to put it into words, it's soft... but not? There's literally no sound when you click too which is quite nice.I would 100% recommend this to any living and breathing person. If you don't like it, there's something wrong with you lol.
